dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 5317 IH: To repeal section 2141 of the Revised Statutes to remove the prohibition on certain alcohol manufacturing on Indian lands.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Herrera Beutler (for herself, Mr. Kilmer, Mr. Young of Alaska, Mr. Heck, and Mr. Cole) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To repeal section 2141 of the Revised Statutes to remove the prohibition on certain alcohol manufacturing on Indian lands.

section.header: Repeal of prohibition on certain alcohol manufacturing on Indian lands
section.text: Section 2141 of the Revised Statutes (25 U.S.C. 251) is repealed.
